+----------------------+--------------------------------+-------+------+-------+-------+----------------------+
| Name                 | Type                           | Scope | Line | Init  | Used  | Initial Value        |
+----------------------+--------------------------------+-------+------+-------+-------+----------------------+
| i                    | int                            | 1     | 1    | Yes   | Yes   | 0                    |
| x                    | int                            | 1     | 3    | Yes   | Yes   | 1                    |
| j                    | int                            | 2     | 4    | Yes   | Yes   | 0                    |
| main                 | () -> int                      | 0     | 10   | Yes   | No    | Function             |
+----------------------+--------------------------------+-------+------+-------+-------+----------------------+
